news.title: The FCC is letting SpaceX launch 7,500 more Starlink satellites
news.summary: The FCC approved SpaceX's plan to launch an additional 7,500 Gen2 Starlink satellites on Friday. That brings the total number of satellites the company will have in orbit to around 15,000 worldwide. news.title: Show HN: Librario, a book metadata API that aggregates G Books, ISBNDB, and more
news.summary: TLDR: Librario is a book metadata API that aggregates data from Google Books, ISBNDB, and Hardcover into a single response, solving the problem of no single source having complete book information.
